text: The baseball competition at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games was held in Veracruz, Mexico. The tournament was held from 15–21 November at the Beto Avila Stadium. This tournament served as a qualifier for the baseball tournament at the 2015 Pan-American Games in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
